title: The One About Vulgarities
description:
On this week's episode, Bob and Monet celebrate the last leg of their tour, they discuss The Masked Singer, they get into the holiday spirit and the two dive into the topic of vulgarities.
Want to see exclusive Sibling Rivalry Bonus Content? Head over to www.patreon.com/siblingrivalrypodcast to be the first to see our latest Sibling Rivalry Podcast Videos!
@BobTheDragQueen
@MonetXChange
